column4: I can't SSH to my server anymore. I get "Server unexpectedly closed the connection. Is there any way I can know what's causing it?
-vvvv will give you a verbose explanation of what the ssh connection attempt is doing as it happens
violinappren: How do I do it from Windows (putty)? And I actually do have a SSH session running from before it stopped working; can I see any logs that could help?
